# __Data storage and management challenges for the massive amount of data generated by iot devices in healthcare__

## Articles mentionning the risk

* [Singh_internet_2020](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Article/PBN__Article_565.md)

## Mitigations of this risk

* [Implement robust data storage infrastructure with redundancy, backup, and access controls, and adhere to data retention and protection regulations](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Mitigation/PBN__Mitigation_16156.md)

## Name of the risk

Risk of data loss, corruption, or unauthorized access to sensitive health information

## People affected by this risk

* [Healthcare insurers](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_31.md)
* [Healthcare providers](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_121.md)
* [Patients](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_11591.md)

## Stakeholders who can mitigate this risk

* [Cloud service providers](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_216.md)
* [Healthcare organizations](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_5317.md)

## Technologies linked to the risk

* [Access control mechanisms](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Technology/PBN__Technology_344.md)
* [Cloud storage](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Technology/PBN__Technology_150.md)
* [Data encryption](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Technology/PBN__Technology_2366.md)
* [Redundancy and backup systems](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Technology/PBN__Technology_16575.md)

## This Risk belongs to this RiskGroup
